capability.name: Disbursement
capability.definition: This service domain handles the disbursement of funds to newly established loans/facilities as necessary
capability.role: This service domain handles the disbursement of funds typically for different loan facilities. Though typically a rather simple service it is modeled as a discrete service center as many banks handle disbursements from a specialist unit
capability.example: A disbursement is processed at the closing of a new loan

key_features.name: Handle disbursements for new loans
key_features.description: Enables handle disbursements for new loans to support this service domain handles the disbursement of funds to newly established loans/facilities as necessary

key_features.name: Report on disbursement activity/status
key_features.description: Enables report on disbursement activity/status to support this service domain handles the disbursement of funds to newly established loans/facilities as necessary
